QuestData.Title: Favor: Dredger's Toolkit
QuestData.Description:
This item will be of great interest to the brokers.
Per your previous deal with The Night Market, you should bring it to Ta'xera.
You will be fairly compensated.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Dredger's Toolkit to Ta'xera at The Night Market in Revendreth.
